EmailTemplate.name: Appointment Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your appointment is confirmed! Appointment Number: {!Appointment__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Appointment__c.Season_Ticket_Holder_Name__c},
Your appointment with {!Appointment__c.Appointment_With_Name__c} is scheduled for {!Appointment__c.Appointment_Date__c} at {!Appointment__c.Appointment_Time__c}. We look forward to seeing you!
Best, The New York Jedi Masters
